titles.title: Railroad Reform, Enhancement, and Efficiency Act
Railroad Infrastructure Financing Improvement Act
Track, Railroad, and Infrastructure Network Act
A bill to reauthorize Federal support for passenger rail programs, improve safety, streamline rail project delivery, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

calendar.text: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
